input_text:
CASHIER
Career Overview
Experienced Receptionist Personable and enthusiastic Receptionist with more than 15 years of experience in training, operations, and customer service in various positions, including reception.
Detail-oriented professional skilled at working independently and with diverse teams to ensure results.
Effective communicator comfortable with people from multicultural backgrounds and demonstrated history of establishing rapport with leaders at all levels.
Areas of Expertise Customer Service Cash Management Order Processing Microsoft Office Electronic Medical Records Interpersonal Communications Training and Instruction Nonprofit Case Management Medical Terminology Schedule Maintenance Multi-Line Reception Administrative Support Purchasing Procedures Vendor Negotiations Exam Room Preparation

WORK EXPERIENCE

Cashier
January 2012
to
January 2013
Company Name
— City , State
Greeted customers upon arrival and responded to inquiries for product or policy information.
Calculated costs and managed cash drawer before, during, and after shifts to ensure accuracy.
Answered more than 20 calls daily to resolve customer concerns and answer product questions.
Issued credits, receipts, and refunds to customers and maintained loyal clientele.
Maintained cleanliness and order around checkout areas.
Assisted with pricing and stocking of products, including special order coordination.
Responded to customer complaints to resolve issues in a proactive and helpful manner.

January 2012
Company Name
— City , State

Ensured compliance with all departmental policies and procedures.
Collaborated with Program Coordinator on various projects.
Facilitated instruction on group exercise for people of all ages and skill levels.
Promoted correct form, position, and alignment during aerobic dance courses.

to

— City , State

Implemented various therapeutic and counseling methods to ensure success and progress.
Provided care, such as checking vital signs and changing sterile dressings.
Performed clerical tasks, including reception and data entry in electronic medical records database.
Monitored medication stock to replace expired products.

Performed annual inventory of assets, including identifying and logging each item.
Served as Switchboard Operator relief.

output_json.summary: Experienced Receptionist with over 15 years in training, operations, and customer service.

description: Greeted customers, answered inquiries, calculated costs, managed cash drawer, resolved customer concerns, maintained cleanliness, assisted with product management, and resolved customer complaints.
Supported recreational sports team, coordinated programs, ensured compliance with policies, facilitated instruction, promoted correct form, and collaborated with Program Coordinator.
Developed treatment plans, conducted assessments, maintained resource files, implemented therapeutic methods, provided care, performed clerical tasks, monitored medication stock.
Placed orders, negotiated prices, researched vendors, verified orders, processed invoices, and performed annual inventory.
Prepared submissions, maintained activity reports, ensured exceptional customer service.
Created maps, trained interns, collaborated with clients, and managed office tasks.
Conducted research, compiled data, and managed office tasks.
Supported physicians, X-ray technicians, organized patient field, assisted with patient transfers, fulfilled code card requests, maintained sanitation and safety.
Managed office operations, provided reception, assisted with dental procedures, maintained patient records, educated patients, confirmed benefits.
